snippet: To the Editor:    The notion that population growth is good for California and, for that matter, for the United States, is ridiculous (front page, Sept. 3). Any benefits seen in California are short term and will hurt the state in the long haul. M...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The notion that population growth is good for California and, for that matter, for the United States, is ridiculous (front page, Sept. 3). Any benefits seen in California are short term and will hurt the state in the long haul. Most of the people who are moving into the state are unskilled, and many are illiterate.
abstract: V R Durvasula letter on Sept 3 article on California's renewed growth (S)
